title: Changpeng Zhaoâ€™s X account was briefly hidden following Binance resignation
description:
Former Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao briefly had his social media profile restricted on X after stepping down from his executive position. For a short amount of time on Nov. 23, attempts to access Zhao’s X profile returned a standard restricted account message, which read: “Caution: This account is temporarily restricted. You’re seeing this warning because […]

The post Changpeng Zhao’s X account was briefly hidden following Binance resignation appeared first on CryptoSlate.
